summary: No explicit REQ-* requirements were provided in the BuildRequest. The diff implements a logo asset reference via a shared BrandLogo component and updates the site favicon; it also updates project metadata/state files. Some changes (favicon update, project_state.json edits) are not clearly requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated site favicon to a generated v2 asset
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest asks to apply a user-provided logo everywhere and restore the previous theme, but does not mention changing the favicon.
Not requested by the BuildRequest (no requirement to update summary files).
